issue.title: [C++] ArrayRangeEquals should accept EqualOptions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10143](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10143). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Besides, the underlying implementations of ArrayEquals and ArrayRangeEquals should be shared (right now they are duplicated).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10143?focusedCommentId=17237348) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8703
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8703>
